content: catnip ice cream cones a quick and easy pattern to make ice cream cones for your cats pattern by porchparty you will need 3 75 mm yarn hook or smaller size yarn needle worsted weight yarn in beige or brown worsted weight yarn in any other color yarn scraps for sprinkles catnip polyfil we will be starting from the top of the ice cream and moving onto the cone stuffing with catnip and polyfil as we go start with your ice cream color 1 6 single_crochet in magic loop 2 2 single_crochet in each single_crochet 3 1 single_crochet in x 6 4 2 single_crochet in x6 5 repeat 6 repeat 7 repeat 8 repeat 9 2 single_crochet decrease x 6 10 flo 3 half_double_crochet 4 half_double_crochet x 9 switch to cone color here 1 in blo of round 9 7 single_crochet decrease x 2 tie the tails from the cone color and ice cream color together here 2 repeat 3 6 single_crochet decrease x 2 4 repeat 5 5 single_crochet decrease x 2 stuff the cone with catnip here it might get messy 6 repeat 7 4 single_crochet decrease x 2 8 repeat 9 3 single_crochet decrease x 2 10 2 single_crochet decrease x 2 stuff the remainder with polyfil i like to make mine firm tie off and sew together to finish up add sprinkles and give to cat
